Articles.Content:
So I just got back from a mission with my SSTO (all tested and used several times with no problems), landed on the runway and was now rolling along, all fine.

Suddenly parts of a wing started exploding for no reason, they didn't touch the ground or anything, and then some part of the runway waaay behind the vehicle exploded, and also some part of the launchpad. Both now have some minor damage wich i need to repair.

I found this really weird as I had just safely landed and was just rolling slowly along the runway..

This is not too bad though, happened only this once so far. I am just interested as to what might have caused that if anyone knows. Thanks!
Sounds like the phantom buildings bug. If it happens again, check the flight log (Fn+F3). If you can reproduce it reliably, post your quicksave and/or reproduction steps.
